title: WASSA} 2024 Shared Task: Enhancing Emotional Intelligence with Prompts
authors:
Churina, Svetlana  and
Verma, Preetika  and
Tripathy, Suchismita
venue: Proceedings of the 14th Workshop on Computational Approaches to Subjectivity, Sentiment, {\&} Social Media Analysis
abstract: This paper describes the system for the last-min-submittion team in WASSA-2024 Shared Task 1:Empathy Detection and Emotion Classification. This task aims at developing models which can predict the empathy, emotion, and emotional polarity. This system achieved relatively goodresults on the competitionâ€™s official leaderboard.The code of this system is available here.
